Sense Settings Debug Email Password Name Gender Height Weight Date of Birth Log in Sign Up Sense Pill Other Normal Low Battery Unknown Error An unknown error has occurred. %1$s\n\n%2$s (Status: %3$d) Loading… Could not load timeline MMMM d MM/dd/yy h:mm a H:mm EEEE – h:mm a EEEE – H:mm -- Last Night Sleep Score Temperature Humidity Particulates -- Motion Noise Snoring Sleep Talk Light Lights Out Sleep Motion Sleep Sunset Sunrise Woke Up Partner Moved Other Male Female Other New Question Skip This Question Log Out Are you sure you want to log out? Log Out Alarm Forgot Password Introduce yourself. Meet Sense My Info Account Units and Time Devices Before Sleep Last Day Past Week Thank You Sense New Question Continue Turn on Bluetooth I\'m having trouble Setting up Sense Make sure Sense is plugged into a wall outlet next to your bed. Pairing with Sense Now we\'ll pair your phone with Sense. Make sure your Sense is plugged in and nearby, then tap Continue. Pairing Connecting Secured Network Scanned Connecting Sense to Wifi Please select your WiFi network from the list below: Enter your Wifi credentials: Other Network Name Skip A simple system that tracks your sleep, monitors the surroundings in your bedroom and reinvents the alarm, so you can sleep better. Play Get Started I don\'t have a sense Welcome When is your birthday? Next Are you male or female? How much do you weigh? How tall are you? Feet Inches 5 8 130 lbs> Attach Sleep Pill to your Pillow Clip your Sleep Pill to the pillowcase you sleep on. You may need to pull it taught between two hands. Choose an LED color for your Sleep Pill so you know which one is yours. Pairing your Sleep Pill Shake your Sleep Pill for three seconds to pair it with your Sense. You may need to shake it quickly for it to register. Before you sleep Before you go to bed, you’ll want to check that everything’s set for a good nights sleep. Simply wave your hand over Sense, and instantly you’ll know about the conditions in your room. Go ahead, give it a try now.

Green means everything’s good. Orange means something’s a little off and red means you should adjust something before sleep. You’re all set up.\nWell done. All you need to do now is sleep. The wifi network credentials you entered are incorrect. The wifi network you selected could not be found by Sense. Sense could not obtain an IP address on the wifi network you selected. Last Seen Signal Strength Firmware Version Strong Good Weak Put Into Pairing Mode Factory Reset Perform factory reset? This will clear all of Sense\'s settings, and log you out. Leave On Boarding? Don\'t worry, you can come back later. Retry Share Insights New Alarm Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun , "Smart Alarm ― " Tomorrow Never Time Zone Sound None Delete Alarm Done Delete Are you sure you want to delete this alarm? Rescan Breakdown Sleep Timeline Close %1$s - %2$s Pair New Pill Pair New Sense Select Wifi Network Looking for Sense… Connecting with Sense… Discovering Services… Linking Your Account… Your phone\'s bluetooth appears to be unstable. Restarting your bluetooth and wifi radios should help fix any issues you are experiencing.\n\nIf issues persist after restarting bluetooth and wifi, it is recommended you restart your phone. Restart Bluetooth & Wifi Looking for your Sleep Pill Set up another Sleep Pill? Would you like to set up a second Sleep Pill for your partner at this time?\n\nYou can always do this later by visiting Settings. Set up another Sleep Pill No Thanks Have your partner get the app Your Sense is now in Pairing Mode.\n\nHave your partner visit hello.is/app to download the Sense app and create a new account. They will be given instructions to set up their Sleep Pill. Finding Wifi Networks… Help Sense Not Found We could not connect to your Sense. Please make sure your Sense is plugged in, nearby, and in Pairing Mode. Adding a second Sleep Pill? Are you adding a second Sleep Pill to a Sense that has been set up previously, or are you setting up Sense for the first time? I\'m adding a second sleep pill I\'m setting up a new Sense To connect a second Sleep Pill, Sense needs to be put into Pairing Mode.\n\nPlace your hand on top of Sense for seven seconds, and then remove it.\n\nSense will glow purple when it is in Pairing Mode. Add a second Sleep Pill Security WPA2 WPA WEP Open Smart Alarm Last Seen %1$s An account with the email address %1$s already exists The email address or password you entered is incorrect. You must enter your email address and password. Checking Connectivity… Pill Pairing Failed Sense couldn\'t register your Sleep Pill. Please try pairing again. Try moving your Sleep Pill closer to Sense, and shaking it harder. We could not connect to your Sense. Please make sure your Sense is plugged in, and nearby. This information is used to provide personalized sleep insights. Please enable Bluetooth to continue. An internal Bluetooth error has occurred (%1$s) Bluetooth operation timed out Could not modify bond with Sense (%1$s) Operation could not be completed because you are not connected to a Sense Could not resolve services offered by Sense device Your Sense is already linked to this account. Your Sense cannot be paired to anymore devices. You must provide a name. You must provide a valid email address. You must provide a password with 4 or more characters. The passwords you entered do not match. Exit Do you really want to exit? There are unsaved changes to this alarm. Answer Could not play video. Turning On We could not turn your Bluetooth on or off. Room Conditions Last Night Sense uses Bluetooth to communicate with your mobile device. Please turn on your Bluetooth to continue. Pair With Sense Are you sure you want to pair with ‘%1$s’? Change Password Current Password New Password Confirm New Password Set a Smart Alarm The Sense Smart Alarm knows where you are in your sleep cycle and will wake you up at the right time for you. Just wave your hand over Sense to turn it off. I\'ll do this later Set a Smart Alarm now Sound Light Checking Temperature Checking Humidity Checking Particulates Checking Sound Checking Light Success! Everything is working well and looks great. Now let’s set your first Smart Alarm. Room Check Sense will now check the conditions in the room to assure functionality of the sensors. You cannot set more than one smart alarm per day of the week. Unpair Unpair Sleep Pill Are you sure you want to unpair this Sleep Pill from your Sense? You can re-pair it with your Sense later from the device details screen. Trends Current Conditions Today Setting Time Zone… Pushing Data… Sense is busy, please retry again in a few moments. Change Email Email Address Change Email Please login again Could not play preview Please select a sound for this smart alarm. Turn Off Bluetooth Sense no longer requires Bluetooth be turned on, would you like to turn it off? Turn Off What\'s your location? Sense uses your location to know sunrise and sunset times, local weather, and more. Set Location
